statements: SELECT * FROM user_connections
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM user_connections WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM user_connections ORDER BY connection_date DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(friend_id) AS num_friends FROM user_connections GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_connections WHERE friend_id = 2
SELECT user_id, friend_id, connection_date FROM user_connections WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_connections WHERE connection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM user_connections WHERE friend_id = 5 ORDER BY connection_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_connections FROM user_connections GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_connections > 3;
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM user_connections WHERE user_id = 2 AND friend_id = 4 OR friend_id = 6;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users WHERE username = 'John';
SELECT * FROM user_connections WHERE connection_type = 'friend';
SELECT user_id, connected_user_id FROM user_connections WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, c.connection_type FROM users u JOIN user_connections c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 2;
SELECT u.username, u.email, c.connection_type FROM users u JOIN user_connections c ON u.user_id = c.connected_user_id WHERE c.connection_type = 'friend';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_type = 'friendship' AND connection_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_type='Follower' AND connection_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY connection_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id1, user_id2 FROM friendships WHERE friendship_status='Accepted' ORDER BY friendship_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT user_id1, user_id2, connection_date FROM connections JOIN friendships ON connections.user_id1 = friendships.user_id1 AND connections.user_id2 = friendships.user_id2 WHERE connection_type='Friend' AND friendship_status='Accepted';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE online_status = true;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Friends ORDER BY friend_id DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM Messages WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE online_status = TRUE ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT friend_id, friendship_status FROM Friends WHERE friendship_status = 'accepted';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM Messages WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY send_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(connection_id) AS connections_count FROM Connections GROUP BY user_id HAVING connections_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_connections;
SELECT user_id, connection_id FROM user_connections WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_relationships ORDER BY friend_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profile WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_connections WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, connection_id FROM user_connections WHERE connection_type = 'professional' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email, location FROM user_profile WHERE location = 'New York' AND username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY email;
SELECT * FROM user_relationships WHERE relationship_type IN ('friends', 'colleagues') LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
